name: Haunted Heart
description:
Haunted Heart was my individual project for my Interactive, Digital, and 3D Capstone course. It revolves around a sad ghost who wakes up in a cemetery. With all the time he's spent alone, he has grown lonely and his heart has broken. You must play him as he explores the cemetery and help him mend his broken heart.

Use A and D to move, S to attack, and ESC to pause.  There are a couple bugs on the latest upload that I will have fixed in the next couple days.

There is an issue on the second level where you can not restart if you die. I plan to fix this once the rest of my final projects are done this semester :)
